womenfield.description: The state of Michigan is full of opportunities for women to excel in the I.T. world.

Rhita is the Director and Software Project Management Specialist of Harman International Industries Inc. in Novi, MI. She has a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Engineering from the University of Michigan
womenfield.name: Rhita Boufelliga

womenfield.description: Diana is CIO and Interim CEO at Oakland Community Health Network in Troy, MI. She has a Master of Science in Business Information Technology from Walsh College.
womenfield.name: Diana Bundschuh

womenfield.description: Amy is CEO of inerTrain Inc. in Kalamazoo, MI. She has a Bachelor of Arts in Psychology and Education with minors in Computer Science and Math from Kalamazoo College.
womenfield.name: Amy Courter

womenfield.description: Beth is Vice President and Global Process Leadership of Stefanini Inc., located in Southfield, MI. She has a Master of Science in Computer Science from Ball State University.
womenfield.name: Beth Gebrai

womenfield.description: Stacy is CEO of Executive Director and CIO, Global Information Technology, of General Motors Co. in Detroit, MI. She has a Master of Science in Information Technology from Carnegie Mellon University.
womenfield.name: Stacy Lynett

womenfield.description: Wendye is Managing Director of Information Technology at The Kresge Foundation in Troy, MI. She has a Doctorate of Philosophy in Instructional Technology from Wayne State University.
womenfield.name: Wendye Mingo

womenfield.description: The state of Illinois is a great place for women to excel in the I.T. world.
Alifya is a Director of Engineering at Signal Digital Inc. in Chicago. She has a Master Of Science in Computer Science the from University of Southern California.
womenfield.name: Alifya Kagalwalla

womenfield.description: Srivani is a dynamic and results-oriented software professional at Aetna, CVS Health Company. She holds a Masters degree in Computer Applications.
womenfield.name: Srivani Vokkarane
